scripts.pm2:restart: if pm2 show saying.today ; then pm2 restart saying.today ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for saying.today' ; fi
scripts.pm2:stop: if pm2 show saying.today ; then pm2 stop saying.today ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for saying.today' ; fi
scripts.pm2:delete: if pm2 show saying.today ; then pm2 delete saying.today ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for saying.today' ; fi
scripts.pm2:reboot: npm ci && npm run generate && npm run build && npm run pm2:stop && npm run pm2:delete && npm run pm2:start
